A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I wonder how much these so called critics were greased? 
When I read these preposterous titles that they came up with for their articles on the last Jedi.
I went to see the movie\, and I was expecting a lot.
Maybe I should start of with the fact that I wasn't a fan of Rogue one\, and I had feared but hoped they wouldn't set that as a standard for their Star wars Saga.
I've been a Star wars fan for as long as I can remember\, but episode 8 made me not want to see the last movie.
After episode 7 I was still hopeful\, it was a pathway to a very promising eight chapter. Unfortunately\, I don't think I could think of a way to make it worse than they had.
This is no longer star wars...
Just a generic $$$ Disney movie.
Try that on for a title "critics"!
